definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc

sentences.english: In the meantime, Sri Lanka became the centre of the earlier Theravada order of Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，斯里兰卡成了佛教早期派别上座部的中心。

sentences.english: There were many Taoist sects in the T'ang Dynasty, in which, the Shangqing Sect had the most important influence.
sentences.chinese: 在唐代众多的道教派别中，上清派的影响最大。

sentences.english: There are many schools on modern business-cycle theory, which hold different views and ideas.
sentences.chinese: 现代经济周期理论派别林立，观点各异。

sentences.english: Different Christian sects have divided the list of commandments up differently.
sentences.chinese: 不同的基督宗教派别有各自不同的十诫。

sentences.english: The party has broken up into several splinter groups.
sentences.chinese: 该党已分裂成几个派别。

sentences.english: The political party Split up into many factions.
sentences.chinese: 这政党分裂成好几个小派别。

sentences.english: Differences of opinion broke their party up into factions.
sentences.chinese: 意见的分岐使他们的党分成了若干派别。

sentences.english: And a smaller faction of it, led by ArthurMutambara, has now endorsed Mr Makoni.
sentences.chinese: 穆塔姆巴拉领导的小派别已经决定支持马科尼先生了。

sentences.english: Lion dancing can be broadly categorized into 2 styles, northern lion dancing and southern dancing.
sentences.chinese: 中国的舞狮可划分为北狮和南狮两个派别。

sentences.english: Different factions of Christianity, Li is also due to send to another.
sentences.chinese: 对基督教的不同派别，李鸿章也因派而异。

sentences.english: The two main schools of Mahayana Buddhism often debate this problem.
sentences.chinese: 大乘佛教中的两大派别在这一问题上时常发生争论。

sentences.english: Governments of differing political persuasions continued to support the subsidies .
sentences.chinese: 不同政治派别的各层政府都继续维持补贴。

sentences.english: So that's where the saying, "all the world's kungfu stems from Shaolin" originally comes from.
sentences.chinese: 这是说少林功夫主要有十八个派别，都有自己的特色。

sentences.english: The scholarship of Han and Song were both important schools in the traditional Confucian scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 汉学与宋学皆为传统儒学的重要派别。

sentences.english: The latter is only a modern variant of the denom ¬inational religions.
sentences.chinese: 后者仅仅只是派别宗教的现代变体。

sentences.english: Buddhism and Brahmanism are the religions which have more philosophical thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 佛教和婆罗门教是各种宗教中思辨性较强的派别。

definition: lit. true religion/orthodox religion/orthodox Christianity/Islam (in the writing of Chinese or Hui theologians)
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
